description: Enable Application Signals for Python Flask application on EC2
validation_rubric: CloudWatchAgentServerPolicy IAM managed policy is attached to the EC2 instance role in the CDK stack
aws-opentelemetry-distro package is added to requirements.txt or pyproject.toml
If a Dockerfile exists, it includes installation of aws-opentelemetry-distro
Modified files have no syntax errors (valid Python, TypeScript, JSON, etc.)
Existing application code is preserved without breaking changes
